channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Place to learn about Kotlin and Android

item.title: Pagination with Jetpack Compose
item.description: Declarative UIs are on the rise in Android with Jetpack Compose. We are going to explore how to use the paging library component.

item.title: Collaborating with designers for dark mode on Android & iOS
item.description: This blog post will share my experience working with designers on how to bring the best experience for your platform, whether it is Android or iOS.

item.title: Building a RESTful API with Ktor & MongoDB Altas
item.description: Are you tired of configuring a database all by yourself and want to code what matters? Then this is for you!
